title: Little River Canyon National Preserve: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Little River Canyon National Preserve offers many things: * Waterfalls * Sightseeing from Overlooks on our 11 mile Scenic Drive (AL Hwy 176) * Hiking * Picnicking * Scenic & Nature Photography (Commercial Use requires a permit) * Water Activities * Kayaking (for skilled users) * Rockclimbing/Rapelling * Trails for Horses (Horses not provided) * Fishing (with a valid license) * Hunting (with valid licenses in the BackCountry Area during specified dates)       Looking for more information? Explore the other pages in this section to learn more.
